text: "Tight Connection to My Heart (Has Anybody Seen My Love)" is a 1985 song by Bob Dylan. It was taken from his 23rd studio album Empire Burlesque. It went to number 8 in New Zealand, number 38 in Belgium and number 71 in Canada. The music video was filmed in Tokyo and featuring actress Mitsuko Baisho. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Bob Dylan songs
title: Tight Connection to My Heart (Has Anybody Seen My Love)
